name: ownerof.art
description: A blockchain primitive that enables an NFTs owner to partake in on-chain provenance
author: ryley-o <30364988+ryley-o@users.noreply.github.com>

scripts.subgraph:build:generic: yarn subgraph:prepare:generic && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.subgraph:deploy:sepolia: yarn subgraph:prepare:sepolia && graph codegen && graph deploy --product hosted-service ryley-o/ownerof-art-sepolia
